short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to easily share your clipboard between devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used to easily share your clipboard between devices.

To send, simply open the chrome extension, paste in your clipboard text and click SEND. Wham-o! You're there.

To receive the clipboard text that you've saved, simply open the chrome extension, click in the FETCH box, then click COPY. Wham-o! You now have your clipboard transferred.

Your clipboard text is saved in our data store, then overwritten each time you submit a new clipboard. None of your data is permanently saved or transferred anywhere else.
